scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup circuits/main.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_15.ptau circuit_final.zkey
scripts.verify-setup: snarkjs zkey verify circuits/main.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_15.ptau circuit_final.zkey
scripts.generate-verifier: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier circuit_final.zkey verifier.sol
scripts.clean: rm -rf circuits/*.r1cs circuits/*.wasm circuits/*.sym build/ proving_key.zkey verification_key.json verifier.sol
